articles.title: Two-Year-Old Australian Girl Tested Positive For H5N1 Bird Flu: WHO - NDTV
articles.description: A two-and-a-half-year-old girl tested positive for H5N1 bird flu and needed hospital intensive care treatment in Australia after travelling to India, the World Health Organization said on Friday.
articles.content:
The WHO assesses the current risk to the general population posed by the virus as low.
